ack.title: Acknowledgment
ack.p: We acknowledge Key R&D and promotion projects (Science and Technology Project) from﻿ Henan Science and Technology Department, grant number ﻿212102310127, Research grant from China Postdoctoral Science Foundation (grant number 2020M672291), and National Natural Science Foundation of China (grants numbers 82071331, 81870942, 81520108011). We are thankful to Dr. Qian Bai (The Second Affiliated Hospital of Zhengzhou University) for her help in designing figures, help in revisions, modifications of the mansuctipt, and providing funding for this study. We wish to thank Ms. Laraib Ghazi (Department of Bioinformatics Hazara University) for her valuable technical support for the computational studies on this project. And I also thank the Government Postgraduate College Mandian, Abbottabad to provide us platform for this research.
